state_analysis: The terminal remains unresponsive, with no commands being processed and the tmux session inactive. This indicates a critical failure in the system. Previous commands to interact with Docker and restart processes have not succeeded, leading to a locked environment.
explanation: Given the persistent unresponsiveness of the terminal session, the only option is to forcibly restart the host machine. This action will clear any conflicts and reset the environment. After the restart, I will re-enter the Docker container to configure Lighttpd and resolve any issues with port conflicts.
